mapper.insert: insert into data_service.poi_info(name,address,avg_score,comment_num,front_img,avg_price,gmt_created,gmt_modified) values(#{title}, #{address},#{avgScore},#{allCommentNum},#{frontImg},#{avgPrice},now(),now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=VALUES(name), address=VALUES(address), avg_score=VALUES(avg_score), comment_num=VALUES(comment_num), front_img=VALUES(front_img), avg_price=VALUES(avg_price), gmt_modified=now()
